# GitHub Social Media Preview for Fax Compiler

## Repository Banner Text

```
╔═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                    FAX COMPILER                           ║
║                                                           ║
║     A modern, functional-first programming language       ║
║              that compiles to LLVM IR                     ║
║                                                           ║
║     v0.0.1 pre-alpha • Now Available on GitHub           ║
╚═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝
```

## Preview Image Ideas

### Option 1: Simple Text Banner
Create a 1280x640 PNG with:
- Background: Dark gradient (#0d1117 to #161b22)
- Text: "Fax Compiler" in large white font
- Subtitle: "A modern, functional-first programming language"
- Badge: "v0.0.1 pre-alpha" in orange
- Icons: Rust + LLVM logos

### Option 2: Code Sample
Show a beautiful code snippet:
```fax
fn main() {
    let message = "Hello, Fax!";
    println(message);
}
```

### Option 3: Architecture Diagram
Show compiler pipeline:
```
Fax Source → Lexer → Parser → Semantic Analysis → LLVM IR → Native Code
```

## Tools to Create Preview

### Free Options:
1. **Canva** - https://canva.com (search "GitHub OG Image")
2. **Figma** - https://figma.com (free tier available)
3. **Photopea** - https://photopea.com (free Photoshop alternative)

### Templates:
- GitHub OG Image size: **1280 x 640 pixels**
- Recommended format: **PNG**
- Keep important content in center (avoid edges)

## Quick Creation with Canva

1. Go to https://canva.com
2. Search for "GitHub Repository Banner"
3. Choose a tech/developer template
4. Customize with:
   - Title: "Fax Compiler"
   - Subtitle: "Functional-first • LLVM IR • Rust"
   - Version: "v0.0.1 pre-alpha"
5. Download as PNG
6. Upload to GitHub repository

## Alternative: Use GitHub's Default

GitHub will automatically generate a preview from:
- Repository name
- Description
- Topics

This is already configured and looks good!
